item.title: Why you won’t have nightmares about volatility decay on Float Capital.
item.description: In this blog we will explore the concept of volatility decay on leveraged assets, which often keeps investors up at night and why this won’t be the case for users on Float Capital.

item.title: We’re shipping a funding rate. Here’s why and how.
item.description: Float Capital has experienced explosive success with our OHM-USD market and our partnership with Olympus DAO. It has attracted so much capital that for a week during the last month we were the fastest growing derivatives protocol in all of DeFi.

item.title: Hedge your OHM position with Float Capital
item.description: Float Capital is launching an Olympus market, providing another diversification option for all OHM holders and giving Ohmies new strategies for interacting with OHM.

item.title: Own our future with Reality Cards
item.description: Reality Cards is allowing users to own the future of Float Capital.

item.title: Float Capital Presents: A New Era of Magic Internet Assets
item.description: The Float Capital Alpha is going LIVE on the Polygon network!

item.title: Apeing in Responsibly: Managing risk in the Float Alpha
item.description: “Apeing In Responsibly (AIR)” — the practice of depositing a large amount of liquidity in a protocol while understanding the risks. E.g. “Remember to AIR.”

item.title: Introducing Float Capital: The Future of On-Chain Assets Powered by Chainlink
item.description: First up, some massive news. The Float Capital Alpha goes LIVE on Polygon, this Friday, September 17, 2021.
